content:
Seems like vulnerability scan: sites/all/civicrm/packages/OpenFlashChart/php-ofc-library/ofc_upload_image.php
this is in the logs of many sites on regular base last days.
Please check who is involved, I do not use civicrm.
You are asking who to do what?
@Vladimir Looks like this is a known and very old vulnerability, but thanks for the heads up! https://civicrm.org/comment/7134
"This vulnerability was eliminated in the CiviCRM v4.2.6 release (Dec 2012)"
